org.opensaml.messaging.pipeline

Class BasicMessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensaml.messaging.pipeline.BasicMessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
  • Type Parameters:
    OutboundMessageType - the outbound message type
    InboundMessageType - the inbound message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicHttpClientMessagePipeline, BasicHttpServletMessagePipeline

    public class BasicMessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
extends Object
implements MessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
    Basic implementation of MessagePipeline.

      • getOutboundPayloadMessageHandler

        public MessageHandler<OutboundMessageType> getOutboundPayloadMessageHandler()
        Get the (optional) outbound payload message handler instance.

        This is the handler intended to be called on the outbound message context, prior to any message encoding.

        Specified by:
        getOutboundPayloadMessageHandler in interface MessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
        Returns:
        the outbound message handler, may be null

      • setOutboundPayloadHandler

        public void setOutboundPayloadHandler(@Nullable
                                      MessageHandler<OutboundMessageType> handler)
        Set the outbound payload message handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - the new handler

      • getOutboundTransportMessageHandler

        public MessageHandler<OutboundMessageType> getOutboundTransportMessageHandler()
        Get the (optional) outbound transport message handler instance.

        This is the handler intended to be called after MessageEncoder.prepareContext(), but before MessageEncoder.encode().

        Specified by:
        getOutboundTransportMessageHandler in interface MessagePipeline<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
        Returns:
        the outbound message handler, may be null
